snippet: The man, 20, who traveled to Syria to fight alongside a group associated with the Islamic State, was sentenced to three years and nine months in juvenile detention.
lead_paragraph: The man, 20, who traveled to Syria to fight alongside a group associated with the Islamic State, was sentenced to three years and nine months in juvenile detention.

headline.main: Germany, in a First, Convicts a Returned Jihadist

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
